Monzo Bank,6582185,Data Lead,San Francisco or New York City,https://job-boards.greenhouse.io/monzo/jobs/6582185,"&lt
column3: content-intro&quot
column9: üöÄ We‚Äôre on a mission to make money work for everyone.&lt

column1: &lt
column3: We‚Äôre waving goodbye to the complicated and confusing ways of traditional banking.&amp

column1: &lt
column3: With our hot coral cards and get-paid-early feature, combined with financial education on social media and our award winning customer service, we have a long history of creating magical moments for our customers!&lt

column1: &lt
column3: We‚Äôre not about selling products - we want to solve problems and change lives through Monzo ‚ù§Ô∏è&lt

column1: &lt
column3: &lt
column7: Hear from our team about what it&#39

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: &amp

column1: &lt
column3: Monzo Group is a leading financial technology company, with over 9 million customers in the UK, committed to providing modern banking solutions. In the last few years, we‚Äôve built a banking app that our customers love ‚Äì with extremely high daily engagement, an industry leading net promoter score, and award-winning customer support. We‚Äôve raised over $1 billion from Capital G, Google‚Äôs growth fund, Ribbit Capital, TenCent, YCombinator, Stripe, Coatue, Eric Schmidt, Mike Moritz, and others - most recently at a $5 billion valuation.&lt

column1: &lt
column3: We‚Äôre just getting started in the US. We‚Äôre a full stack team operating like an early stage startup but with the financial, operational, and engineering platform muscle of a larger company. We‚Äôre focused on building an amazing US product, shipping and iterating quickly, and deepening our product market fit. We‚Äôre looking for highly driven, enterprising people to help us achieve our mission to make money work for everyone.&lt

column1: &lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: Leading the data strategy and continue to evolve Monzo US for our customers to make it magically simple to manage money day-to-day&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Identifying opportunities across the business to improve metrics&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Reporting: We want the data team to own reporting across Monzo US, acting as the source of truth on all things metrics&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Enablement: enabling the ease of understanding and consumption of data across the organization. This includes both maintaining and organizing dashboards to ensure accuracy, and enabling the organization to build with the right set of information (ex. A/B testing, launch dashboards)&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Ensuring that the wider business knows where to find the right information, and can trust its accuracy&lt

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: You enjoy working with cross functional fast moving teams&lt

column1: &lt
column3: You are able to think strategically about commercial products and how decisions using data can unlock more value for our customers&lt

column1: &lt
column3: You are excited about data enablement across a growing organisation&lt

column1: &lt
column3: You are excited by experimentation and utilising new data techniques to solve challenging problems&amp

column1: &lt
column3: You want to understand the nuances of our data and are excited about laying the key foundational knowledge for our new products and features&lt

column1: &lt
column3: You are opinionated about how to think about measuring success and are willing to challenge the status quo&lt

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
column3: Our interview process involves:&amp

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: Recruiter Call&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Initial Call&amp

column1: &lt
column3: Technical assessment&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Final Interviews&lt

column1: &lt
&lt
column3: Business Fit/Collaboration&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Case Study&lt

column1: &lt
column3: Technical Interview&lt

column1: &lt
&lt
&lt
column3: Our average process takes around 2-3 weeks but we will always work around your availability. You will have the chance to speak to our recruitment team at various points during your process but if you do have any specific questions ahead of this please contact us on tech-hiring@monzo.com&lt

column1: &lt
column3: One of our recruiters has written a blog on the process, for extra details, hints and tips please see&lt

column1: &lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
column3: ‚úÖ We can sponsor visas&amp

column1: &lt
column3: üìçThis role can be based in our San Francisco or New York office&lt

column1: &lt
column3: ‚è∞ We offer flexible working hours and trust you to work enough hours to do your job well, at times that suit you and your team.&lt

column1: &lt
column3: üìöLearning budget of ¬£1,000 a year for books, training courses and conferences&lt

column1: &lt
column3: ‚ûïAnd much more, see our full list of benefits &lt

column1: &lt
column3: If you prefer to work part-time, we&#39
column4: ll make this happen whenever we can - whether this is to help you meet other commitments or strike a great work-life balance.&lt

column1: &lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
column3: &lt

column1: &lt
column3: Diversity and inclusion are a priority for us and we‚Äôre making sure we have lots of support for all of our people to grow at Monzo. At Monzo, we‚Äôre embracing diversity by fostering an inclusive environment for all people to do the best work of their lives with us. This is integral to our mission of making money work for everyone. You can read more in our &lt

column1: &lt
column3: We‚Äôre an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to age, ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, family or parental status, national origin, or veteran, neurodiversity or disability status.&lt

column1: &lt
column3: If you have a preferred name, please use it to apply. We don&#39
